dependencies.description:
PBR is a library that injects some useful and sensible default behaviors
into your setuptools run.

A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependent_to.description:
This package provides a stable interface for interactions between
Snakemake and its storage plugins.
dependent_to.name: py-snakemake-interface-storage-plugins

dependent_to.description:
A Snakemake storage plugin that reads and writes from a locally mounted
filesystem using rsync.
dependent_to.name: py-snakemake-storage-plugin-fs

dependent_to.description:
Workflow management system to create reproducible and scalable data
analyses.
